name: I MUST RUN
description:
DESCRIPTION:

I MUST RUN is a 2D Auto-Runner with cyberpunk aesthetic made for the "Reto GameDev 4" Game Jam.

The game is based on the 2 restrictions imposed as the Jam's theme:

· The game must only be played with one button

· There must be power-ups in some way

With this in mind, you need to complete 3 levels as fast as you can, with the twist that, if you die, a boost appears in your death position.

Dying and trying again will make your adventure easier (or not).

This is also my first Unity game, after spending 1 month learning some basis, so expect some bugs and missing "easy things"

ENJOY

"Beauty Flow" and "Raving Energy" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
